projects.name: Miku-Dash
projects.info: Miku dash is a browser based platformer I am testing using Phaser.io. Currently the game's arcade box physics collider shapes need to be replaced with more accurate ones in order to fix bugs with the player character standing on objects. Enemies, HUD, Maps, and a better menu will be added soon. Stayed tuned.

projects.name: Hangout-Simulator
projects.info: A Chatting application built with React.js, Node, Express, Socket.io and MongoDB. The UI of this applicaiton is styled and themed after the Yandere Simulator Video game developed by Yanderedev. You can use the app via a test account username: test password: 12345678

projects.name: Crunchy-Scraper
projects.info: A Node.js Scraping applicaiton that Collects news articles from crunchyroll.com. Built with JQuery, Node , Express, and MongoDB.

projects.name: Nutrimon
projects.info: Nutrimon is a free platform for eating healthier and calculating nutrition. Character images are by © Bandai - All rights reserved but are there as placeholders for a proof of concept. The idea is based on the old ©Tamagatchi games that would allow you to feed a digital pet. This application is built using Javascript/JQuery/CSS, and is using Firebase to store the users information

projects.name: DBZ-Battler
projects.info: Dragonball Z is an anime created by Akira Toriyama that I grew up watching and still love to this day. I decided to build a turn based battle game built in Javascript/JQuery/CSS. Mind you this is an old project and does not reflect my current skill level. I just really like DBZ !!

projects.name: Hangman
projects.info: This is a hangmangame built for the browser with multiple categories and theme music. This was one of the first homework projects that I built at the Coding Bootcamp at UNC-Chapel-Hill.

projects.name: MatchPlusPlus
projects.info: A friend finding and dating application built in AngularJS , Node, Express, and Redis Database. Not currently deployed as it is still in development but feel free to download the source and run it locally. Requires installation of redis server
